Module uk.ac.soton.comp1206
Package uk.ac.soton.comp1206.scene

Class ScoreScene

java.lang.Object
uk.ac.soton.comp1206.scene.BaseScene
uk.ac.soton.comp1206.scene.ScoreScene
All Implemented Interfaces:
CommunicationsListener
public class ScoreScene extends BaseScene implements CommunicationsListener
Scores scene. Holds the high scores and is displayed after a Single Player game ends

    • loadScores

      public void loadScores()
      Populates the scoresArrayList using the file. If file doesn't exist, create one with dummy data

    • writeScores

      public void writeScores()
      Write the contents of the scoresArrayList to the file

    • checkNewHighScore

      public boolean checkNewHighScore()
      Check if new high score was set by comparing the values in the scoresArrayList to the new score
      Returns:
      return true if new high score was set

    • newHighScoreSet

      public void newHighScoreSet(String name)
      Adds new high score to the scoresArrayList and calls the writeScores() method to write it to the file
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the player that set the high score

    • loadOnlineScores

      public void loadOnlineScores(String[] hiscores)
      Populate the remoteScores using the communication received from server
      Parameters:
      hiscores - the communication received from server about the online high scores of players

    • writeOnlineScore

      public void writeOnlineScore(String playerName)
      Submit the high score to the server
      Parameters:
      playerName - the name entered by the player when they are prompted for their name after achieving a high score

    • receiveCommunication

      public void receiveCommunication(String communication)
      For receiving remote scores
      Specified by:
      receiveCommunication in interface CommunicationsListener
      Parameters:
      communication - the message that was received
